concept.title: Welcome to Spring Break 2k17
concept.shortdesc: Finally, a week off from class and school. To celebrate, let's go to Chicago.

conbody.p: This year we're going to Chicago for three days before heading back to Virginia Beach for the rest of the week. It's going to be a fun time with museums, brunch, the Chicago Bean (Cloud Gate), the Willis Tower Skydeck, and eating deep dish pizza.

Look at how good that looks, aren't you excited? We're also going to this museum, the Art Institute of Chicago, which was recently named the World's Best Museum, to see if it really stands up to that title.
We're going to be staying with Amanda in her apartment, so pack your suitcase and let's get to it.
